name: Swiveling Escape
description:
Story

In Swiveling Escape V 1.3.2, players will navigate through a series of obstacles and challenges as they attempt to escape. The unique gameplay mechanic in this game is the rotation feature, where players must rotate the character and navigate through the levels by using the arrow buttons.  Muhammad Ali, a game developer at Alimad Interactive Entertainment, develops the game. The game is known to be frustrating but also challenging and fun, players will have to use their skills and patience to overcome the obstacles and reach the end of the game. With each level, the difficulty increases, and players must strategize and plan their moves carefully to progress. With its unique gameplay, challenging levels, and endless fun, Swiveling Escape is a must-play for fans of puzzle and action games.

Requirements

Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 or 11

Open GL ES 2.0 or above

At least 2 GB RAM

480 × 640 px Resolution or above

60 Hz refresh rate

Credits

Made by Muhammad Ali

Published by Alimad Corporations

Made using
